entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.2°C

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 15.

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 03:23 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 30%
